title: Sanjay Leela Bhansali Announces His Next Most Ambitious Magnum Opus Project Baiju Bawra!
text:
There are reports for quite sometime that Sanjay Leela Bhansali has been planning to remake 1952 Meena Kumari starrer cult classic Baiju Bawra. The grapevine also suggested that Sanjay Leela Bhansali has been trying to rope in Salman Khan and Shah Rukh Khan for his most ambitious project. Finally, he has made the announcement about the project.

Twitter

On the occasion of Diwali, Sanjay Leela Bhansali who had announced Gangubai Kathiawadi starring Alia Bhatt, has now announced yet another project titled Baiju Bawra -- a revenge story of a maverick maestro.

Who will star in the project? That hasn’t been announced as of yet. However, it is said that Ajay Devgn also has chances of starring in the movie. If that happens, it will be first collaboration of Ajay and Bhansali. Meanwhile, Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan’s name is doing the rounds already.

The original Baiju Bawra, which had released in 1952 was a musical drama that also starred Bharat Bhushan. The movie had won Meena Kumari her first-ever Best Actress Filmfare Award in 1954.

The movie will be released on Diwali 2021.
